name: Buddhist Soldier vs Demons
description:
Game: a 2d side scrolling hack n slash game inpired from Tibet Buddhism

How To Play:  Press "J" to attack

                               Press "K" to dodge

                               Press "F" to change player state

                               Kill red enemies in body（RED） state；

                               Kill blue enemies in spirit (BLUE) state; 

                               Holding attack button to kill long enemies
